summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Matrix News French app with rich text editor improvements. All major features from review request successfully tested and working correctly including custom rich text editor, avatar dropdown animation, HTML sanitization, and content rendering.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 520 server errors instead of 429 during rate limiting tests
minor_issues.impact: Rate limiting may be handled at infrastructure level rather than application level

clarifications.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
clarifications.impact: Actually correct FastAPI behavior - 403 'Not authenticated' is proper response

integration_issues.issue: Image insertion via URL panel may not insert into editor content immediately
integration_issues.impact: Minor - image insertion functionality present but may need refinement

Header displays orange 'AD' avatar with chevron after login
Avatar dropdown appears with black background and orange border animation
Dropdown contains 'Mes articles', 'Créer un article', 'Déconnexion' items

Rich text editor visible with complete toolbar (H2, H3, B, I, U, lists, blockquote, image)

Article form validation displays errors for missing title, category, content
Valid article creation workflow complete with success notification
Created articles visible on homepage with proper category badges
Article detail pages accessible and loading correctly
HTML content rendering working with dangerouslySetInnerHTML
Backend HTML sanitization with bleach removing XSS attacks
Rich text article creation storing HTML content correctly
Article view counter incrementing

Form validation preventing submission without required fields
